lst.name: sentence
lst.str: She said the surplus of 597 mln pesos, compared with a deficit of 390 mln pesos a month earlier and a deficit of 1.64 billion at the end of 1985, reflected political uncertainty in the last quarter of 1986.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The bank official said the broader M-2 measure, which measures notes and coins in circulation plus savings and time deposits, rose a provisional 9.7 pct to 140.88 billion pesos at the end of December from 128.41 billion a month earlier.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Liquidity in the Philippines rose in December while loan demand and short-term lending rates fell, the Central Bank said.

lst.name: sentence
